meanings.definition: A plural noun meaning the bell towers of Italian churches.
meanings.sent1: The campanili of the church rang out across the village.
meanings.sent2: The campanili stood tall against the Italian skyline.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel climbed one of the campanili and started ringing the bells!
meanings.sent4: As the sun set, the campanili cast long shadows over the cobblestone streets.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the campanili echoed through the valley, signaling the start of the evening mass.
